examples.text: The theories proposed by Ren√© <w>Girard</w> have had a significant impact on literary criticism.
Please tell Mr. <w>Girard</w> that the meeting has been rescheduled for tomorrow morning.

senses.sense_definition: One of several cities or towns in the United States, notably in Kansas, Ohio, and Pennsylvania.

examples.text: They decided to stop in <w>Girard</w> for lunch while driving across the state.
The mayor of <w>Girard</w> announced plans to renovate the historic town square.
